snippet: His decreased leverage makes delivering on his promises seem more challenging than ever.
abstract: Editorial urges New York Gov Andrew Cuomo to follow through on campaign promises despite facing a difficult political landscape in his second term; observes that some obstacles are of Cuomo's own making; calls on him to reform corruption in Albany, pursue package of women's rights proposals, address immigrants' rights and raise the minimum wage.
lead_paragraph: His decreased leverage makes delivering on his promises seem more challenging than ever.
